entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning late this evening then changing to periods of rain after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
